title: Newbie alert!
content:
Hello,

I’m Paul, a designer from the UK. I’ve just joined Typophile and thought i’d wave a tentacle and say hello to everyone in this great forum. Looking forward to chatting to like-minded font geeks soon! :)

Cheers
author: fabre

comments.content:
Glad to welcome you Paul.

ChrisL

Welcome to the dark side, Paul.

hhp

lighten up woncha, hrant! ;^D

and welcome, paul.

Type design is a succubus. Make yourself comfortable.

hhp

The majority is still male in the world of type design, therefore it is an incubus. But I argue that type in general is a pleasing thing and therefore cannot be thought of in any sort of demonic form.

Welcome to the forums, Fabre.

Blimey, thanks for the warm welcome guys…

\*Must learn to post more on this forum\* =)
Paul tell us a bit about you. Are you a type designer? And hi and welcome too
